Articles.Content:
Make missions using only, Jet Engines, RAPIER Engines, Ion Engines and nuclear engines. It can be any mission, just these engines.

Points

Sub orbital -1

Orbit-5

Edited February 16, 2014 by Nick7892
how do we get points? were is you attempt?
I made a edit for points. It is also 11pm is my time zone. (PST) I do not have time for it right now.
Could be a fun little challenge, but you need more rules, mods allowed is RAPIER allowed?
What? Sorry, but this is not a mission! The count of possible objectives is almost infinite. It's like saying "play KSP without the use of liquid fuel rockets and SRBs".

What? Sorry, but this is not a mission! The count of possible objectives is almost infinite. It's like saying "play KSP without the use of liquid fuel rockets and SRBs".

If you dont think this is a challenge, just go Search the other topics and dont try to take down this challenge. You dont have to do this challenge. The guy took his time to make a challenge for us, respect him for that.

While I did not legitamately get it to Minmus, a Minmus landing is entirely possible and, with the NFP HI-SNAP engines, practically trivial. This was one of the easiest landings I've ever done, seriously!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/d8onf96ukybdb5y/screenshot50.png

Sorry about the dark, that's just how it happened.

Dropbox has a problem with image embedding so deal with the link. I'm in the process of transitioning everything over to Flickr . . . slowly.

EDIT: I think the point values might want to scale in accordance with the type of engine used, just a thought. After all, a nuke Mun landing is trivial compared to an ion Mun landing.

Edited February 16, 2014 by Captain Sierra
